name: Sakura Nova
overview: Experience the fantastic journey of three beautiful heroes in this cute, epic visual novel. Join Mikage, Kaguya, and Arisa as they train together, fight together and come together at a prestigious academy for young, aspiring knights. To join the ranks of the warrior elite, these femme fatales must overcome their clashing personalities and learn to work together no matter what it takes! It’s an adventure of action, magic and humor! Features: * All new, playful adventure from Winged Cloud! * Japanese Voice Acting for main characters! * Gorgeous girls and art. * 3 different endings.
